column1: Valwë was the father of Lindo
column2: the keeper of the Cottage of Lost Play on Tol Eressëa.

column1: Valwë is a Qenya name. The Gnomish version of the name was Gwalweg. Patrick H. Wynne has suggested that both appear to mean "the happy (or fortunate) one".
Category:Characters in The Book of Lost Tales
